# RPC Providers

You can use any of the following providers to connect to the Massa blockchain.
The latency experienced may vary depending on the geographical location of the provider.
You can use multiple providers to enhance redundancy and for load balancing.

| Provider   | Endpoint                            |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------- |
| [Massa](/docs/build/networks-faucets) | `https://test.massa.net/api/v2` |
